```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(tm)
library(SnowballC)
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
docs <- DirSource(directory = paste0(getwd(), "/final/en_US"))

texts <- VCorpus(docs)

texts <- tm_map(texts, stripWhitespace)

texts <- tm_map(texts, content_transformer(tolower))

texts <- tm_map(texts, removeWords, stopwords("english"))

texts <- tm_map(texts, stemDocument)

cdf <- function(n){
        output <- numeric(n)
        output[1] <- freq[1]
        for(i in 2:n){
                output[i] <- freq[i] + output[i - 1]
        }
        
        100*output/numwords}
```
